comments.creator: ludovic@hirlimann.net
comments.text:
Hi Martin,

If you work for sil, you could more easily host the file yourself as exlained at https://developer.mozilla.org/en/Thunderbird/Autoconfiguration#Configuration_server_at_ISP - this makes autoconfiguration faster and easier to maintain for you, if you change things in the futur.
comments.author: ludovic@hirlimann.net
